Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

MILES_DIGITAL_FLAGS

The basic type MILES_DIGITAL_FLAGS describes the layout of digital audio.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 DIG_PCM_ORDER If present, stereo data is in RL order; else LR.


Group: 2D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_set_sample_type
